meanings.definition: A person who plants seeds or crops.
meanings.sent1: The planter carefully placed each seed in the soil.
meanings.sent2: The farmer is a skilled planter, growing various crops on his land.
meanings.sent3: The planter joked that they had a 'green thumb' because all their plants thrived.
meanings.sent4: She was a planter of dreams, sowing ideas that blossomed into reality.
meanings.sent5: The planter's dedication to gardening was evident in the lush garden they tended.

meanings.definition: A container in which plants are grown.
meanings.sent1: The planter on the windowsill held a beautiful array of flowers.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new planter for her indoor plants to thrive in.
meanings.sent3: The planter on the balcony added a touch of nature to the urban apartment.
meanings.sent4: The planter overflowed with vibrant blooms, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The ceramic planter was carefully painted with intricate designs.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for planting seeds.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a mechanical planter to sow the seeds quickly.
meanings.sent2: The planter efficiently planted rows of seeds in the field.
meanings.sent3: The planter malfunctioned and scattered seeds everywhere, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The precision of the planter ensured each seed was placed at the right depth.
meanings.sent5: The futuristic planter used advanced technology to optimize planting efficiency.
